## Why Denoising Matters in Medical ML {background-image="cell_13748_100.png"}

-   Noisy tumor images reduce model performance.

-   Real-world data is often noisy, especially in medical imaging.

-   Denoising is common, but rarely evaluated for downstream ML impact.
